listitem.para: All security updates issued since UCS 4.4-0 are included:

listitem.simpara: firmware-nonfree (CVE-2018-5383) (49379)
gst-plugins-base1.0 (CVE-2019-9928) (49401)
ghostscript (CVE-2019-3839) (49451)
rdesktop (CVE-TMP49772) (49772)
univention-directory-notifier (48466)

listitem.para:
The following packages have been moved to the maintained repository of UCS:
numad (47574) python-setproctitle (49176) configparser (49588)

listitem.simpara: Fix usage of &ucsUCR; Python module in univention-bootsplash. (49129)

OpenLDAP restricts the number of returned entries when searching. This can be configured using the &ucsUCRV; ldap/sizelimit, which defaults to 400k. This is not enough for univention-translog prune. Remove the limit for searches connecting via ldapi:///. (49505)
Use slaptest for LDAP schema checking in the ldap_extension module. (49596)
Increase the length of the LDAP root password (/etc/ldap/rootpw.conf) used for LDAP replication to improve security against brute force attacks. (48606)
By default univention-ldapsearch appends the argument -o ldif-wrap=no now. (48683)
The resync_objects.py helper script now respects the configured local LDAP port. (49228)
Check available file system space before writing transactions. (28233)
Fix regression from 426 in cn=translog setup, which reset the LDAP indices. (48971)

Since 427 the &ucsUDN; (UDN) writes transactions both to the file /var/lib/univention-ldap/notify/transaction and the cn=translog database in OpenLDAP. A failed write to the later can make UDN abort, in which case UDN is restarted automatically and writes the pending transactions to said file again. This leads to inconsistency. The order has been swapped to prevent this issue from happening again. The transaction file might require manual corrections if UDN fails to start up properly. (49198)
Deprecated and unused code has been removed. (49277)

Add univention-translog check --fix command to check (and fix) inconsistency between the files /var/lib/univention-ldap/notify/transaction, /var/lib/univention-ldap/notify/transaction.index, /var/lib/univention-ldap/listener/listener, and /var/lib/univention-ldap/last_id. (49201)

listitem.para: Implement command univention-translog prune to prune old transactions from the transaction file and database. This can be used to save space.

warning.para: This procedure is dangerous and should ONLY be executed if ALL &ucsUDL; (UDL) in the domain have processed all previous transactions. Otherwise the UDLs will no longer be able to process transactions and affected systems must be re-joined! Systems, which have not been running for some time or are restored from backup, must also be re-joined if their last processed transaction is no longer part contained in the purged translog. (48729)

listitem.simpara: Change dependency of package univention-dojo-dev from openjdk-7 to default-jre-headless as the former is deprecated and no longer maintained. (49508)
The legacy path /umcp/ to access UMC backend has been removed. (49639)
The design of the UMC login page can now be adjusted via /usr/share/univention-management-console-login/css/custom.css. (49436)
UMC does not respond with an error anymore if no English locale is configured. (47602)
The UMC for UCS Core Editions shows a notification that informs about the UCS Ambassador Program. (49731)
Error messages during login or password changing are translated again. (49029)
The SAML identity provider is not configured in UMC anymore if it is disabled via the &ucsUCRV; umc/web/sso/enabled. (48224)
The label and icon of some widgets are now configurable. (49730)
Notifications can now be shown non-truncated. (49731)
A cross site scripting vulnerability in umc.widgets.Editor has been fixed. This affected portal entries. (48812)
Preparations for better browser cache-control have been implemented. (48995)
It is possible to define standby animations for form dependencies now. (46919)
Password input fields can now have a button to show the password in clear text. (49099)
Grids can now automatically encode HTML entities (48972)
Portal entries which are limited to users are now shown when the user is logged in via email address. (49619)
Whether portal entries are opened in the same tab or a new tab is now configurable. (45318)
Debug statements where added to the portal server listener. (49113)
The file permissions for the cache directory of the Portal is now stricter. This prevents warnings in the System diagnostic UMC module. (48814)
Obsolete code has been removed. (48943)
The robustness of the univention-portal-server has been increased. (49526)
The univention-portal-server is reloaded after a server password rotation. (49746)
The error message for a failed password change has been improved. (48897)
The UCS identity provider configuration is always fetched when executing the joinscript 92univention-management-console-web-server.inst (48198)
Obsolete code has been removed. (48943)
The UMC now uses json instead of simplejson. (47377)
Corrupt translation files cannot cause UMC to crash anymore. (49775)

LDAP connection problems could result in an error loop, with the following error ldapError: Insufficient access. This has been fixed by ensuring a new connection is used after LDAP connection problems. (46089)
A crash of UMC in rare situations has been corrected. (48157)
The pam_cracklib behavior prior to 450 has been restored. Therefore password changes do not require strong passwords anymore if no password policy is defined in the domain. (49239)

Log rotation for container logs has been enabled in the docker daemon, and can be configured via the &ucsUCRV;s docker/daemon/default/opts/log-driver (default json-file) and docker/daemon/default/map/log-opt (default max-file=4,max-size=10m). (47416)
Added a new listener to save a mapping for App Attributes that the UDM UMC module may read (48895)
Extended Attributes are only searched for in the correct LDAP container (48982)
A crash when registering attributes is prevented during the activation of new schema extensions. (45513)
Docker image verification was removed from the App Center code. Instead, we rely on the functions of Docker itself. (48670)
The App Center waits for a dpkg lock before attempting to install database software packages. If starting the database service fails anyway, we now send more verbose information. (48669)
The package univention-appcenter is now built with dh_python2. (49145)
A visual flickering in the App Center overview has been removed. (49089)
Create app password file on host before starting container. (49491)
The App Center now shows app suggestions based on already installed apps. (49510)
Handling of the docker-compose &ucsUCR; template file has been fixed. (49517)
Abort installation if machine.secret could not be copied into container. (49543)
Improve error handling during container start. (48881)
More debug messages during SetupFailed. (49625)
Do not revert (remove, reinstall old) after failed App update. (49645)
The docker App upgrade message has been changed. (49742)
Suggestions based on currently installed Apps are now dynamically loaded from the App Center server. (49770)
The Admin Diary now displays dates correctly in Safari (49579)
HTML entities in the Diary overview are now properly encoded (48972)
Improve robustness and traceback logging. (49056)
Fix traceback in admindiary.client.write_event() in univention-updater occurring in Docker containers during docker build. (49056)

section.title: &ucsUDM; UMC modules and command line interface

listitem.simpara: A new package has been added which contains a prototype of a HTTP service for the &ucsUDM;. (49667)
Creating reports of objects which reference not existing objects is possible again. This was the case for secretary of user objects and networks of computer objects. (47922)
Rely on the App Center listener to create the App Attributes mapping rather than doing it in the UMC module (48895)
Preparations for better browser cache-control have been implemented. (48995)
Requesting a Univention license activation during the initial system configuration has been repaired. (49384)
The computers/* UDM handlers now share a common base class. Code redundancy has therefore been reduced. (41659)
Searching for IP addresses of DNS host records is now possible. The Zone Time-to-Live and Mail Exchange properties of DNS objects aren't shown in the search field list anymore in UMC. (40668)
A crash of UDM is prevented which was caused by an extended attribute that overwrites a not existing layout group. (48551)
The object class univentionPolicyReference is now removed from objects when the last policy is dereferenced. (46466)
The search filter dnsAlias in the computer modules has been repaired. (31494)
Referenced portal entries and categories are now correctly updated when renaming or moving portal settings. (49526)
Stop caching machine connection in new UDM API for long running services. (49746)
It is now possible to specify LDAP server controls in some UDM handlers lookup() method. (49638)
Clean code by shortening univention.debug usage. (49422)
Explicit initialization of the default values of &ucsUDM; properties has been removed from the code of all UDM modules. (49235)
The users/user UDM module now uses the LDAP filter univentionObjectType=users/user when searching for objects to increase performance. (48390)

When opening container objects, a lookup is performed to check whether this container is the default container for certain UDM objects. This lookup is now cached which makes opening many objects at once considerably faster. (49408)

After renaming an object the internal DN (self.dn) is updated correctly. The old DN can now be obtained via self.old_dn. This fixes the concurrent renaming and update of group membership for e.g. computer objects. (41694)
Several German translations have been updated. (49359)
&ucsUDM; handlers now share a common base class. Code redundancy has therefore been reduced. (35687)
Default containers for domain controller computer objects can now be configured. (46919)
It is now possible again to modify the LDAP base, for example reference policies. This was broken since UCS 4.3-0. (46919)
udm users/user create without --set username does not cause a exception anymore. (48441)
Various LDAP filters are now escaped. (42791)
The use of obsolete univention.admin.config has been removed. (27804)

section.title: Modules for system settings / setup wizard

listitem.simpara: A message is shown to warn about the inability to install Samba4 or &ucsUAS; if a host name with more than 13 characters is chosen. (43326)
Fixed a special case for the initial domain join, the DC master hostname may now differ from the value read from the DNS server. (48134)
The unused dependency to python-simplejson has been removed. (35687)
Requesting a Univention license activation during the initial system configuration has been repaired. (49384)

For &ucsUAS;: The setup process now includes a new confirmation prompt in UCS@school environments to make sure that the server should be set up with the correct UCS@school role (educational, administrative or central). (49271)
If a failed.ldif file exists at the start of a join, it will be removed. (47603)
Fixed joining host into an UCS domain when using bonded network interfaces. (49298)
The path to /usr/sbin/univention-admin-diary-entry-create is now explicit in univention-join (48972)
Prevent high CPU usage in the Users module. (47985)
Updated sysvolcheck check (46643)
Remove the sysvolcheck as it reports irritating false positives for GPOs created via GPMC. (49335)

Previously, when quota policies were set on multiple shares that are located on the same mountpoint, a quota policy that had a value of zero (meaning no quota is enforced) would overwrite smaller quota policies. This behavior has been changed to always choose the smallest value. (48000)
Split low-level C implementation from Python binding to simplify transition to using dh_python2 and adding Python 3 support. (49130)
Unify pure-python version debug2.py again with C-version debug.py. (46100)
Deprecate function class in favor of trace decorator. (43422)
Preparations for better browser cache-control have been implemented. (48995)
The python3-univention package dependencies have been adjusted. (49136)
The package dependency loop for python-univention-debug has been broken by introducing a new binary package python-univention-namespace. (49506)
It is now possible to specify LDAP server controls in the univention.uldap.access.search() methods. (49638)
The package univention-python now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/. (49140)
The setting for unknownClients from the UMC policy DHCP Scope is no longer applied to a DHCP pool statement. This is not allowed by the syntax of the DHCP daemon. (20222)
Fix dependency header of legacy SysV init script to work in environments installed with UCS-4.2 or older and without Samba4. (49441)

The robustness of the listener for DNS zones has been improved. Certain LDAP DNS objects could cause path injection vulnerabilities causing arbitrary file reading and modifications as well as crashes of the bind service. (41005)
LDAP ACL ordering on DC slaves allowed regular users access to private information. Reordering of ACLs fixes this issue. (48608)
Prevent creation of empty mailboxes in /var/spool/dovecot/private/ by unsuccessful login attempts of users without a primary mail address. (49038)

Add SNI Support to univention-mail-dovecot. Additional FQDNs and certificates can be configured with &ucsUCRV; mail/dovecot/ssl/sni/$fqdn/certificate=$path_to_certificate and mail/dovecot/ssl/sni/$fqdn/key=$path_to_certificate_key (48485)
An open SSH connection will now properly get closed when shutting down a system. (47233)

The session duration of the identity provider is now configurable with the new &ucsUCRV; saml/idp/session-duration. With this update, the default value for a SAML session is raised from 8 to 12 hours. (49503)
The design of the UMC single sign-on page can now be adjusted via /usr/share/univention-management-console-login/css/custom.css. (49436)
Fixed links to the Self Service-App not working when the &ucsUCRV; umc/self-service/profiledata/enabled is set to false. (45041)
The Self Service-App can now be styled via the /var/www/univention/self-service/css/custom.css CSS file. (49343)
Fix German translation. (49380)
It is now possible to use space characters in samba printer names. (48947)
A security vulnerability in the listener has been fixed which caused overwriting or removal of arbitrary files. (49296)
The package description has been fixed. (28681)
Fix regression caused by 94 in ghostscript (49721)

The cups configuration in /etc/cups/cupsd.local.conf is applied again. Since 149 the cups Include directive has been removed. Changes in the /etc/cups/cupsd.local.conf configuration require a ucr commit /etc/cups/cupsd.conf now. (48437)
The listener now handles DN syntax correctly. (43430)
A Nagios check for the cn=translog database has been added. (48422)

A Nagios check for the univention-directory-listener database has been added. To apply it on a &ucsSlave;, &ucsBackup; or &ucsMember; execute: univention-run-join-scripts --force --run-scripts 30univention-nagios-client.inst (48617)
The build system for the package univention-python-heimdal has been changed to dh_python2. (49139)
A newline injection vulnerability has been fixed which allowed to add further entries to /etc/exports. (44054)
Re-connect VMs to bridges on network restart. (47701)
Use interleaved memory policy on NUMA architectures by default. (49574)
Fix Python traceback while handling select() exception. (49403)
Preparations for better browser cache-control have been implemented. (48995)
Re-compile libvirt with NUMA support enabled. (49574)

Since 269 UVMM can be configured to check the CPU model before performing a live migration. Due to a bug in libvirt the use of host-model does not survive the creation of snapshots or suspend to disk and gets rewritten to the concrete CPU model of the host system. This has been fixed. Old snapshots created and domains suspended before this erratum might fail to start, in which case the CPU configuration must be manually removed from the XML description using virsh snapshot-edit or virsh save-image-edit respectively. (49425)

Improve samba-tool ntacl sysvolcheck to reduce reporting false positives. This can be run by using new option --mask-msad-differences. Without the new option the reporting is unchanged. This is another step in the ongoing quest of improving the quality this tool for NTACL inheritance. (46643)
The folder windows-profiles in the home share is now hidden. (48541)

Several vulnerabilities in the listener for shares have been fixed: The name of shares are validated. The blacklist for share paths is now evaluated correctly. Configuration values are now correctly quoted to prevent injecting multiple further share entries. (44054)
Re-add auth methods option removed from upstream Samba sources (49426)
If samba fails to set the new password in a server password change, the changes will be reverted. (48541)
UCS will now use password generation from samba for administrator accounts (49193)
Set correct permissions for lock file on upstream server during sysvol synchronization. (48917)
Fix permissions of template files dns_update_list and spn_update_list. (49025)
Update to Samba 4.10.1 (49034)
Internal improvement: fixed quoting of shell variables. (48989)
When univention-samba4-backup fails, cron will automatically send system-mails to root. (49399)
A trivial &ucsUCR; syntax error has been fixed in the joinscript (35237)
Remove lockingdb and s4cache during re-join (40773)

When the S4-Connector starts, it logged the group cache initialization at level INFO. In debugging situations that can lead to a lot of output in connector-s4.log which is hard to scroll. The log volume of the group cache init has been lowered to log level ALL. (48364)
The scripts remove_ucs_rejected.py and remove_s4_rejected.py now escapes SQL syntax. (49445)
Avoid rejects when DNS records have an uppercase DC attribute. (49643)
Fix traceback password sync_to_ucs for machine accounts. (49649)
The package now uses dh_python2 instead of python-support. Therefore Python modules are installed into /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/univention/s4connector/. (49176)
The detection of a running univention-s4-connector has been enhanced. (49176)
Duplicated code for the detection of superordinates has been removed. (45068)
Dead code for obsolete custom attributes from UCS 2 has been removed. (41554)
Excluding sub-trees from synchronization by S4-Connector is now possible by configuring &ucsUCRV;s matching the pattern connector/s4/mapping/ignoresubtree/. (47008)
The use of obsolete univention.admin.config has been removed. (27804)
Dead code for obsolete custom attributes from UCS 2 has been removed from univention-ad-connector. (41553)
References to the obsolete password service in univention-ad-connector have been removed. (49111)
The package univention-errata-level has been updated to reset the &ucsUCRV; version/erratalevel to 0 (48654).
If samba fails to set the new password in a server password change, the changes will be reverted. (49193)
The function getRootDnConnection() has been fixed. (49024)
The LDAP ACLs for read access to cn=monitor can now be extended via &ucsUCRV;s. (49387)
Fix escaping of LDAP DN, filters and shell arguments (46323)
The creation of a default LDAP server policy is now configurable via the &ucsUCRV; ldap/create-ldap-server-policy. (49386)
Log stderr if LDAP schema validation fails. (49500)
A symlink and code execution vulnerability has been fixed in univention.lib.listenerSharePath. (44054)
Python 3 compatibility for univention.lib.admember has been enhanced. (49176)
A path traversal vulnerability in the ldap_extension.py listener utilities has been fixed. (41780)
The detection of running services has been enhanced. (49176)
The script univention-policy-update-config-registry now has a new option to specify the LDAP server from which to get the policies. (35208)
Multiple rsyslog remote servers can now be specified in the &ucsUCRV; syslog/remote. (48508)
&ucsUCR; templates which generate binary data have been fixed. This was broken since 167 and could cause crashes of &ucsUMC; due to corruptly generated translation files. (49775)
Make the systemd service timeout for mysqld configurable via the &ucsUCRV; mariadb/startup/timeout. (46901)
The escaping of LDAP filters and distinguished names has been corrected. (40055)
Reconnect to DRS service in case the DRS replication for the password synchronization fails. (45127)

Default containers for computers/domaincontroller_master objects can now be configured. During the upgrade every default container for computer objects are set as default container for computers/domaincontroller_master except cn=computers and cn=memberservers,cn=computer. (46919)
Re-add accidentally dropped patch to insserv to ignore files ending on .debian. (49441)
ucs-lint: Also ignore temporary directory used by dh_python2. (42480)
ucs-lint: Fixed applying debian/ucslint.overrides when used with paths. (49520)
